programme.title: To, co zostaje
programme.desc: Marianna (Marta Ścisłowicz) i Jan (Piotr Czarniecki) wiodą szczęśliwe życie na wsi w północno-wschodniej Polsce. Pewnego dnia kobieta musi stawić czoła niespodziewanej śmierci męża. Wyrzuty sumienia i nagła strata sprawiają, że potrzebuje czasu, żeby pożegnać ukochanego. Zamyka się z jego ciałem w domu. Jej zachowanie spotyka się z niezrozumieniem mieszkańców wioski.

programme.title: S*P*Y*S
Szpiegomania
S*P*Y*S
programme.desc:
S*P*Y*S: Directed by Irvin Kershner. With Elliott Gould, Donald Sutherland, Zouzou, Joss Ackland. Two spies end up being chased by the CIA, the KGB, and a group of anarchists after a botched mission invoked an unwritten "corpse for a corpse" pact." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0072107/","name":"S*P*Y*S","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2I1YTUzNDAtY2UyYS00NWQ5LWJjYjUtMmUxNGQzYWFjMzQ5L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two spies end up being chased by the CIA, the KGB, and a group of anarchists after a botched mission invoked an unwritten "corpse for a corpse" pact.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0072107/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"spookyrat1"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"This Was Screened at Cannes???","reviewBody":"Second lead pairing of Elliot Gould and Donald Sutherland (Little Murders saw them together, but with Sutherland in a support role) after the wonderful MASH in what was meant to be some sort of funny spy spoof. Alas, there is no Altmann magic with SPYS and this one sinks like the proverbial stone.

They play a mismatched spy pair who are forced to bond when sold down the river by their various agencies and thereafter chase after some micro-dots. The two still appear to have a kind of improvisational energy, but the material they are dished up to deal with, wouldn't pass muster in an average Get Smart episode. I have to say that I'm surprised the usually very competent direction of Irvin Kershner seems to have gone completely walkabout during the making of this feature. Poorly choreographed and lit action and slapstick scenes! It's difficult to believe this is the same bloke who helmed The Empire Strikes Back 6 years later. SPYS is also lumbered with a terribly annoying musical soundtrack.

In terms of laughs most discerning viewers should find any of the Roger Moore Bond entries much more amusing. And as for spoofs, the later arriving Austin Powers or Johnny English (hell, even the Casino Royale with Peter Sellers) have it all over this clunker. I would love to have been a fly on the wall to see how SPYS was received at Cannes.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":954,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1974-09-05","keywords":"hare krishna,espionage,scene during opening credits,scene during closing credits,paris france","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000661/","name":"Donald Sutherland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001285/","name":"Elliott Gould"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0958088/","name":"Zouzou"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0449984/","name":"Irvin Kershner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0032182/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0067477/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119027/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0169549/","name":"Lawrence J. Cohen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0293391/","name":"Fred Freeman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0549393/","name":"Malcolm Marmorstein"}],"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

They play a mismatched spy pair who are forced to bond when sold down the river by their various agencies and thereafter chase after some micro-dots. programme.title: Ratujmy zakład
Pollux
programme.desc: 13-letni Vivian (Vivian Oudin) oraz Max (Maximilien Decorse) nie mogą jechać na tegoroczny obóz letni ze względu na rychłe zamknięcie fabryki, w której pracują ich rodzice. Rodzeństwo oraz ich przyjaciel z dzieciństwa, Tom (Tom-Eliott Fosse-Taurel), wpadają na pomysł, jak zarobić potrzebne pieniądze i miło spędzić wakacje. Pozostało im jednak niewiele czasu na zrealizowanie swojego planu.

programme.title: London Town
London Town
programme.desc:
London Town: Directed by Derrick Borte. With Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Daniel Huttlestone, Dougray Scott, Natascha McElhone. In '70s London, a 14 year-old boy is introduced to the Clash by his estranged mother. It changes his life forever." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1724597/","name":"London Town","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3NjU2MjYzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTk4NzgwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In '70s London, a 14 year-old boy is introduced to the Clash by his estranged mother. It changes his life forever.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1724597/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"subxerogravity"},"dateCreated":"2016-10-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Cool first hand story about a kid who gets introduced to The Clash (in more ways than one)","reviewBody":"I really liked Jonathan Rhys Meyers in it as Joe Strummer. It was fun to see him play a real lively character as the front man of The Clash.

The movie itself is more about how a boy named Shay is influenced by the music of the Clash while going through some hard times. His really hot mom (played by Natascha McElhone) left the family to live the life she wanted, while his father (Played by Dougray Scott), plays the classic stereotype of an adult who forgot what it was like to be young and is shifting too much responsibility on his son. 

London Town is greatly similar to another Coming-of-Age film, Sing Street (which is a little better), as Shay allows a crush on a punk rock girl to greatly influence his walk down the path of punk, which leads him to meeting Joe Strummer. 

The film's formula is very direct, and it's focus on punk rock makes it a perfect persona of the early days of the genre. It's a love letter to The Clash any fan would enjoy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2285,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"the clash,pantyhose,miniskirt,fishnet pantyhose,losing virginity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3651909145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4NDMyMTU2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM1MDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4NDMyMTU2OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTM1MDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 70's London, a teenager is introduced to The Clash by his estranged mother and it changes his life forever."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001667/","name":"Jonathan Rhys Meyers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4948519/","name":"Daniel Huttlestone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0779084/","name":"Dougray Scott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0097517/","name":"Derrick Borte"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0296298/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030755/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0375102/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114226/","name":"Matt Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0839503/","name":"Sonya Gildea"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0792202/","name":"Kirsten Sheridan"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Piąte: Nie odchodź!
programme.desc: 15-letniej Romie (Michalina Olszańska) umiera matka. Dziewczyna nie może sobie z tym poradzić. Ojciec, wzięty psychiatra Andrzej (Łukasz Simlat), jej tego nie ułatwia, gdyż jest pochłonięty pracą. Nastolatka znajduje ukojenie w intensywnych treningach tańca. Pewnego dnia spotyka małomównego mężczyznę, który wprowadził się do domu w sąsiedztwie.

programme.title: Sufit
Katto
programme.desc: Olavi (Juho Milonoff) się rozwodzi. Szukając zapomnienia od związanych z tym nieprzyjemnych okoliczności, przyjeżdża do letniego domku. Na miejscu się przekonuje, że sufit w tajemniczy sposób się obniżył.

programme.title: Raoul Taburin
Tajemnica Raoula Taburina
Raoul Taburin
programme.desc: Raoul Taburin: Directed by Pierre Godeau. With Benoît Poelvoorde, Edouard Baer, Suzanne Clément, Victor Assié. Raoul Taburin is the story of a little boy who has grown up without knowing how to ride a bike. The story of an immense misunderstanding lived as a curse. An impostor despite himself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7831674/","name":"Raoul Taburin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzY1ZTQtN2YyYi00MWJkLThlODUtYTM5ZDg2NjFiMWY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTc5OTMwOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Raoul Taburin is the story of a little boy who has grown up without knowing how to ride a bike. The story of an immense misunderstanding lived as a curse. An impostor despite himself.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7831674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"FrenchEddieFelson"},"dateCreated":"2019-04-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"A humble family movie","reviewBody":"A film gathering Benoît Poelvoorde, Edouard Baer, Suzanne Clément, and inspired from a comic strip of the genial Sempé, it's clearly an offer you can't refuse! Nevertheless, processing a comic into a movie is usually a perilous exercise, due to the probable distorsion of the global atmosphere, with a wide spectrum of divergent opinions on this particular subject. In my humble opinion, the result is rather successful thanks to the magic complicity of the duet Poelvoorde / Baer. I was particularly sensitive to these themes: simplicity, friendship, humility, benevolence and love. As a synthesis, although this movie is not a masterpiece, this a nice entertainment to enjoy with your family during Easter holidays.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":767,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2019-04-10","keywords":"boy,based on franco belgian comic book,based on comic book","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2758588953","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjczNjNkYzItMGVjMy00ZDEzLWFjMDItZTg4Y2VlZjVjZGE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjczNjNkYzItMGVjMy00ZDEzLWFjMDItZTg4Y2VlZjVjZGE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688143/","name":"Benoît Poelvoorde"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0046347/","name":"Edouard Baer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0167501/","name":"Suzanne Clément"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4135794/","name":"Pierre Godeau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060537/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0729612/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1046729/","name":"Jean-Jacques Sempé"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4135794/","name":"Pierre Godeau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491011/","name":"Guillaume Laurant"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

It is forbidden on Ukraine.","reviewBody":"Movie will be probably marked as 1 on IMDb rating by Ukrainian users of IMDb (same like Promise by Turks?). Ukrainian actors whose played in this movie, lost their's jobs after premiere. Those actors had jobs in Ukrainians theaters. Despite the fact that movie is bloody and brutal it shows only small part of cruelties which Ukrainians done during Wolyn genocide to Poles, Jewish, Czechs and other nations. What is important it shows also good Ukrainians. Why important it is estimated that on five Poles killed there were one Ukrainian who were killed becose he didn't want to kill those Poles. This hero Ukrainians there were at least 20 000. Today loots of Ukrainians are proud to carry half black half red flags and they thinks that Bandera and UPA were heroes. Well they weren't. They were just monsters and butchers whose main passion were killing innocent civilians with forks hammers and saws.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5443,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Drama","History","War"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"genocide,year 1943,world war two,massacre,nudity","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8443804/","name":"Michalina Labacz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1458971/","name":"Arkadiusz Jakubik"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8443805/","name":"Wasyl Wasylik"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500530/","name":"Wojciech Smarzowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692063/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692062/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500530/","name":"Wojciech Smarzowski"}],"duration":"PT2H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Giant Little Ones
Wielcy malutcy
Giant Little Ones
programme.desc: Giant Little Ones: Directed by Keith Behrman. With Josh Wiggins, Darren Mann, Taylor Hickson, Maria Bello. Two popular teen boys, best friends since childhood, discover their lives, families, and girlfriends dramatically upended after an unexpected incident occurs on the night of a 17th birthday party." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4481066/","name":"Giant Little Ones","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTEzOTY4YTUtYjZjZC00Mjc0LTlmMzMtM2Q4N2YyNWVmM2EzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk0OTcwMTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two popular teen boys, best friends since childhood, discover their lives, families, and girlfriends dramatically upended after an unexpected incident occurs on the night of a 17th birthday party.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4481066/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kbraidi"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Giant Little Film","reviewBody":"This is a very well made, well cast film. The main subject is adolescence, and how painful it can be. While most of the reviews here seem to be wholly focused on the sexuality aspect, it is also largely about how teens navigate the ebbs and flows of their social relationships, both with their peers and with their parents. Sexual experimentation is on view, to be sure, as is unchecked homophobia and the havoc it can wreak. The film presents no easy resolutions to the problems encountered along the way. Just like real life.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7358,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-03-29","keywords":"teenage boy,teenage girl,teenager,kiss,teenage protagonist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Festival Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1848097561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzRiNTY5ZWUtY2M4YS00NDUzLTkxNjktZGFiYWI3MzhkNjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzRiNTY5ZWUtY2M4YS00NDUzLTkxNjktZGFiYWI3MzhkNjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two popular teen boys, best friends since childhood, discover their lives, families, and girlfriends dramatically upended after an unexpected incident occurs on the night of a 17th birthday party."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5946818/","name":"Josh Wiggins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5795728/","name":"Darren Mann"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6883785/","name":"Taylor Hickson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0067101/","name":"Keith Behrman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0312004/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0541189/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0383468/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0067101/","name":"Keith Behrman"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Rykoszety

programme.desc: Rykoszety: Directed by Jakub Radej. With Stanislaw Linowski, Zuzanna Zielinska, Tomasz Schuchardt, Marta Scislowicz. Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. Two coal miner brothers react differently to the oppressive police state. While Tadek prefers to retreat into neutrality, Janek chooses active engagement in the democratic underground. When Janek asks Tadek to store some anti-government leaflets on the second anniversary of Solidarity's 1980 strikes, he triggers a spiral of events that will have everyone's allegiances and characters severely tested." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8658144/","name":"Rykoszety","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTc0ZGJlOTUtYWM5NS00MjY3LWE5YzYtNWQxMjYyNDU5NjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Poland, 1982, the politically heated days of communist martial law. programme.title: The Daughter
Powrót
The Daughter
programme.desc:
The Daughter: Directed by Simon Stone. With Geoffrey Rush, Nicholas Hope, Sam Neill, Ewen Leslie. The story follows a man who returns home to discover a long-buried family secret, and whose attempts to put things right threaten the lives of those he left home years before." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3922816/","name":"The Daughter","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY2MzA0MTUyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTkyMjEyNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story follows a man who returns home to discover a long-buried family secret, and whose attempts to put things right threaten the lives of those he left home years before.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3922816/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"anthonyjlangford"},"dateCreated":"2016-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Near flawless but not a ride for the faint of heart","reviewBody":"Much has been said already; slick direction, outstanding performances from the entire cast, especially those we are unfamiliar with on the screen and a brilliant story, 140 years old, that cements as the bed rock. (Rush is quite deliciously understated).

I only have two objections. The editing style is unique (dialogue preceding the scene, or carrying over other parts that is not natural but interesting). However I feel the director relies on it too heavily, passing up the potential for good drama. This is especially noticeable in a confrontation between Sam Neill and Geoffrey Rush. The tension is passed over in favour of technique. An error.

The other objection is that the director claims the play 'Inspires' the screenplay. Despite the changes, it's the same story. It should be 'based upon'. Its an obvious flex of ego.

Minor points aside, this a top notch, captivating drama in all regards, showing the complexities of human relations, and that truth is not always the right option. Ah, the intricate web we often unintentionally weave.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5123,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-03-17","keywords":"logging,tavern,alcoholic relapse,lumber mill,lumber","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Daughter","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2621356569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2YxMTdiN2UtNWRiZC00ZTkyLWJlOTEtYTRiMjYzYjBhNGNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2YxMTdiN2UtNWRiZC00ZTkyLWJlOTEtYTRiMjYzYjBhNGNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for The Daughter"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001691/","name":"Geoffrey Rush"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0394034/","name":"Nicholas Hope"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000554/","name":"Sam Neill"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1404307/","name":"Simon Stone"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0286594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0446390/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1404307/","name":"Simon Stone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0406585/","name":"Henrik Ibsen"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Den skyldige
Winni
Den skyldige
programme.desc: Den skyldige: Directed by Gustav Möller. With Jakob Cedergren, Jessica Dinnage, Omar Shargawi, Johan Gotthardt Olsen. A police officer assigned alarm dispatch duty enters a race against time when he answers an emergency call from a kidnapped woman." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6742252/","name":"Den skyldige","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk4MjEzYjctZmY2MS00ZDgyLWFkNDUtOTIyNDkwZjRlY2ZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODAzODU1NDQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A police officer assigned alarm dispatch duty enters a race against time when he answers an emergency call from a kidnapped woman.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6742252/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"asifahsankhan"},"dateCreated":"2018-11-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"How come Danish films are often just so good?","reviewBody":"In the vein of Locke, this super low-budget but effective thriller had me on the edge of my seat. It had the appropriate twists and turns to keep the audience guessing. It played with my emotions and had me in tears. How come Danish films are often just so good?\n\nUnfolding in real time, this immediately involving story bends and turns in surprising, sometimes horrifying ways. programme.title: Simpatico
Simpatico
programme.desc:
Simpatico: Directed by Matthew Warchus. With Nick Nolte, Jeff Bridges, Sharon Stone, Catherine Keener. After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0174204/","name":"Simpatico","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE5YjQ0MjItOTNhMS00NTliLWJjYmEtMTE1NTExNjRlZjRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0174204/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"quicksandyears"},"dateCreated":"2003-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't pick on this dead horse","reviewBody":"I felt like this movie was more than meets the eye. On the surface, it is indeed a somewhat illogical and tedious, but underneath it all, it is a deep and meaningful journey of catharsis and rebirth of the human psyche.

For all intents and purposes, this was more of a play than a movie. There were only a few characters and a lot of dialog; therefore we cannot expect the big bangs and simplified plot lines of cinema. Instead we must search for the underlying meaning played out through the characters' experiences.

I am not quite sure about the exact meaning of it all, and I was hoping for some insight relayed in user comments, but it looks quite solitary in here. The best I can come up with by myself is that this was a story about humanity's struggle to get to the top, and dealing with the consequences of cheating your way there. The characters cannot be content with their lives because they haven't come to terms with the sacrifices they made. The horse, Simpatico, is representative of the house built from their sins. That is why the horse had to die, to end the cycle of pain. Each character was affected in some way by the crime they committed, and no one can move on. They are all frozen, dead, in time and keep reliving that event over and over again in their minds (a true sign of madness). Stone is drugged up on Zanex to deal with her pain, Nolte is a drunk that cannot stop obsessing over his box of evidence, Bridges is a cold-hearted business man who chooses to switch roles and live in squalor, rather than return to his life of wealth, and Finney is the only one who attempted to move on, changing his name and life, not ever wanting to relive it--even to be redeemed.

I think the lesson in it all is that people (and fictional characters) must eventually confront their obsessions, kill that part of themselves that causes suffering, and move on with their lives. Any comments?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3555,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-01-28","keywords":"kentucky,blackmail,scam,woman smoker,volkswagen beetle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Simpatico","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2659385625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JiYTA1MjItM2ZkNS00NTFhLWJiNjYtN2FhNjhmOWY3NDcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JiYTA1MjItM2ZkNS00NTFhLWJiNjYtN2FhNjhmOWY3NDcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Fine Line"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000232/","name":"Sharon Stone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911334/","name":"Matthew Warchus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093471/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010090/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001731/","name":"Sam Shepard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911334/","name":"Matthew Warchus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0390141/","name":"David Nicholls"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Showdown
Otwarte karty
Showdown
programme.desc:
Showdown: Directed by Robert Radler. With Billy Blanks, Kenn Scott, Christine Taylor, John Asher. An ex-policeman/school janitor (Billy Blanks) shows a new student (Kenn Scott) how to defend himself from a martial-arts bully." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0111174/","name":"Showdown","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTk2MmIxMzMtODQ3Ni00ZjBkLTljNzQtYThkNjZiM2I5MzJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-policeman/school janitor (Billy Blanks) shows a new student (Kenn Scott) how to defend himself from a martial-arts bully.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0111174/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"furcheezi"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth A Hilarious Watch...","reviewBody":"The previous post hit the nail right on the head with its summary of this movie. I just wanted to elaborate a bit more on the sheer cheese factor of this film because there really is SO much of it to be discussed. Namely though, the music. 

This movie's score seems to consist of exactly two songs: one for the good guys and one for the crazy/psycho cult dojo members (think Cobra Kai + Marilyn Manson). It is HILARIOUS just how repetitive the soundtrack gets and yet, just like an awful car wreck, you just can't look away. 

This movie really is JUST like Karate Kid in terms of of its storyline but the final battle scene takes it all a whole other step further. Not only do the rival teens get to face off in a tournament, but the sensei's end up dueling as well providing for yet ANOTHER opportunity to play the awesomely/disgustingly cheesy "good guy theme" theme. Imagine Mr. Myagi taking on the Cobra Kai sensei but 40x cheesier than what that might be like. 

In closing, a memorable quote from Billy Blanks at the end of the film that should be heeded by all:

"I'M NOT GONNA LET YOU HURT ANY MORE KIDS, LEE!" 

*CUE Cheesy GOOD GUY THEME*

*SPINKICK*

-- THE END --"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1053,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action"],"datePublished":"1993-09-17","keywords":"janitor,final showdown,opening action scene,action violence,hand to hand combat","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2057224985","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQzYTgxNjYtYWRhMi00YWZmLTkxMTUtZDBmZWZlODg5ZTk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjQzYTgxNjYtYWRhMi00YWZmLTkxMTUtZDBmZWZlODg5ZTk5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An ex-policeman/school janitor (Billy Blanks) shows a new student (Kenn Scott) how to defend himself from a martial-arts bully."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0087593/","name":"Billy Blanks"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003702/","name":"Kenn Scott"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0852132/","name":"Christine Taylor"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705675/","name":"Robert Radler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013199/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070874/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0316736/","name":"Stuart Gibbs"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Sugarhouse
Sugarhouse
programme.desc: Sugarhouse: Directed by Gary Love. With Steven Mackintosh, Ashley Walters, Andy Serkis, Adam Deacon. Determined to kill his wife's lover, a middle-class accountant attempts to purchase a .38 from an inner-city crackhead, unaware the gun actually belongs to a psychotic drug lord who'd kill to get his weapon back." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0847526/","name":"Sugarhouse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWUxZGM1YzEtNWYwYi00Y2UxLTg0OTMtZmFmY2Q2ZDFmMzg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQ5MzY0NjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Determined to kill his wife's lover, a middle-class accountant attempts to purchase a .38 from an inner-city crackhead, unaware the gun actually belongs to a psychotic drug lord who'd kill to get his weapon back.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0847526/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jfcthejock"},"dateCreated":"2008-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Good British Crime Thriller","reviewBody":"Sugarhouse is something that has been done in the past quite a lot in British cinema with the likes of Bullet Boy and Kidulthood, a film centred around the raw realities of life and of course crime. There isn't really anything new with Sugarhouse, but what it does do is revitalise classics like those above and give you a more up to date adaption.\n\nThis adaption in question includes the talents of Steven Mackintosh and Andy Serkis, both well known British actors along with new British talent Ashley D. Sugarhouse is dark, compromising and of course brings up questions about morality and human nature. Violent at times but of course this is what makes this specific genre so appealing and riveting! I'd recommend this film to fans of either Rollin' With The Nines or Kidulthood.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1297,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2007-08-24","keywords":"bully,beating,male full back nudity,bare butt,male nudity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sugarhouse","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2882863897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNDA2Mjg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzNTMyMg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTgxNDA2Mjg2MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODAzNTMyMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Movie Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0533599/","name":"Steven Mackintosh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0910180/","name":"Ashley Walters"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0785227/","name":"Andy Serkis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0522327/","name":"Gary Love"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009090/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132203/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0187060/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2364947/","name":"Dominic Leyton"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Another Day
W innym życiu
Another Life
programme.desc: Another Day: Directed by Jeffrey Reiner. With Shannen Doherty, Max Martini, Julian McMahon, Courtney Kidd. A woman's boyfriend dies in a fire after a fight over the couple's unborn child. After the woman is involved in a drowning accident a few years later, she wakes up on-shore to find that she's living two days before her boyfriend's fatal fire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0295172/","name":"Another Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwODQ3MDQwNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTA3NzU4Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A woman's boyfriend dies in a fire after a fight over the couple's unborn child. After the woman is involved in a drowning accident a few years later, she wakes up on-shore to find that she's living two days before her boyfriend's fa","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0295172/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"critterkid_13"},"dateCreated":"2009-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A movie I thoroughly enjoy","reviewBody":"A comment i keep seeing about this movie is that the plot at times does not make sense. I have the answer as to why.\n\nThe movie was written by my aunt and uncle, Don MacLeod and Helen Frost. When my aunt and uncle write, they write their movies in a format appropriate for release on the big screen. TV movies require huge amounts of plot to be cut out for the allotted time period. As such, important details were cut out of the movie itself which sometimes made the plot a little hard to follow. If you read the original script written by them, the plot makes complete sense, but for the sake of time compression, key events and plot happenings had to be taken out.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":766,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2001-12-04","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001147/","name":"Shannen Doherty"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0242882/","name":"Max Martini"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573037/","name":"Julian McMahon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718001/","name":"Jeffrey Reiner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020958/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016350/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1094769/","name":"Helen Frost"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104079/","name":"Don MacLeod"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

If you read the original script written by them, the plot makes complete sense, but for the sake of time compression, key events and plot happenings had to be taken out.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":766,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2001-12-04","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001147/","name":"Shannen Doherty","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0242882/","name":"Max Martini","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573037/","name":"Julian McMahon"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718001/","name":"Jeffrey Reiner"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054762/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020958/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016350/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1094769/","name":"Helen Frost","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104079/","name":"Don MacLeod"],"duration":"PT1H30M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Con Express
Ekspres śmierci
Con Express
programme.desc: Con Express: Directed by Terry Cunningham. With Sean Patrick Flanery, Arnold Vosloo, Ursula Karven, Eyal Podell. Agent Brooks tells his side of a botched job at a job interview for for the Head of Customs in Alaska. He takes a tip that a shipment of bio-weaponry is coming in and discovers a Russian terrorist, Simeonov, is behind it. Brooks assembles a team and they go down to the docks to check the tip out. There a shoot-fest follows, an undercover FBI agent surfaces and a Russian agent, Natalya arrives to claim rights over Simeonov. Simeonov is arrested but while being transferred to Washington he escapes and with his fellow terrorists hijack the train carrying the stolen Russian nerve gas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0310907/","name":"Con Express","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NDEwOTU3Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzc3NTQ5._V1_.jpg","description":"Agent Brooks tells his side of a botched job at a job interview for for the Head of Customs in Alaska. He takes a tip that a shipment of bio-weaponry is coming in and discovers a Russian terrorist, Simeonov, is behind it. Brooks asse","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0310907/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"JimmyL5555"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"very weak action picture.....don't bother","reviewBody":"The entire movie is set in Flashback mode as an agent tells his superiors what happened in a Russian biochemical weapon terrorist transaction aboard a train that resulted in a huge folder of paperwork. The movie takes a while to get going, but once it does, you ride on the wave, and it doesn't get any faster than 2nd gear. Footage from the 1985 Eric Roberts' movie "Runaway Train" is used, and you kind of wish your were watching THAT movie instead. There is very little, if any, suspense, and it's a total waste of two hours. If you want to see this kind of story done well with edge-of-your-seat suspense, I'd recommend "Under Siege 2: Dark Territory" and "Atomic Train".","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":462,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action"],"datePublished":"2002-11-22","keywords":"hijack,train,die hard scenario,m16 gun,m 16","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Cons Express","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi599720217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2I0OGExYWMtMDYxOS00ZjMxLThjODctMWI3YjY2OTBkMThhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2I0OGExYWMtMDYxOS00ZjMxLThjODctMWI3YjY2OTBkMThhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001218/","name":"Sean Patrick Flanery"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0903677/","name":"Arnold Vosloo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440291/","name":"Ursula Karven"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192463/","name":"Terry Cunningham"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0027550/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083590/","name":"Paul A. programme.title: To End All Wars
Droga do wolności
To End All Wars
programme.desc: To End All Wars: Directed by David L. Cunningham. With Ciarán McMenamin, Robert Carlyle, Kiefer Sutherland, Mark Strong. A true story about four Allied POWs who endure harsh treatment from their Japanese captors during World War II while being forced to build a railroad through the Burmese jungle. Ultimately they find true freedom by forgiving their enemies. Based on the true story of Ernest Gordon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0243609/","name":"To End All Wars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDMxMTExOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzEwMjYyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A true story about four Allied POWs who endure harsh treatment from their Japanese captors during World War II while being forced to build a railroad through the Burmese jungle. programme.title: Daylight
Tunel
Daylight
programme.desc:
Daylight: Directed by Rob Cohen. With Sylvester Stallone, Amy Brenneman, Viggo Mortensen, Dan Hedaya. Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116040/","name":"Daylight","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGE5MDkxYzktODU4OS00Yjc4LTk5MjktYzlkY2RjMGVlNjU0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDc2NjEyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Disaster in a New York tunnel as explosions collapse both ends of it. One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116040/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mgsmoviesniper"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fasten your seatbelts and brace yourself for an non-stop thrill ride","reviewBody":"Fasten your seatbelts and brace yourself for an non-stop thrill ride that will have you holding your breath from start to finish.

"Daylight" is one of the most intense movies I have seen in a long time. Sylvester Stallone gives one of his best performances in "Daylight" leading a group of civilians to safety after a New York tunnel engulfs in flames. Stallone works his magic as a former EMS chief sent in to save these civilians.

When I heard Stallone's name mentioned as part of the cast of "Daylight," I knew it would be a non-stop thrill ride; however, what I didn't realize it would be a thriller that had depth mixed in with everything else. "Daylight" is a credit to Stallone's ability and this remains one of his best roles to date.

Adding to this awesome film are Stallone's co-stars, which include Amy Brenneman, Viggo Mortensen, Jay O. Sanders and Stan Shaw. I enjoyed watching this ensemble work together because they seem to need no direction when on screen. It was as if they were really trapped in the tunnel. From the fear to the heroic actions they took, these actors were top notch.

I concede that "Daylight" is predictable. However, I disagree with those who say it hurts the film. My point is it doesn't matter whether a film is predictable, rather how it is presented. "Daylight" is presented with quite unique special effects, a plot with depth and endearing performances.

In addition to the excellent performances, "Daylight" had some of the best special effects I have seen. The explosion at the beginning of the movie was a work of art. I was in awe of how well the special effects were pulled off because I don't believe that "Daylight" would have worked as well as it did if they were done with less than 100 percent effort.

"Daylight" will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"1996-12-06","keywords":"collapsing tunnel,electronic music score,blowout,pistol,director cameo","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000312/","name":"Amy Brenneman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001557/","name":"Viggo Mortensen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0062608/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092018/","name":"Leslie Bohem"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

One hero tries to help the people inside find their way to safety.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116040/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"mgsmoviesniper","dateCreated":"2006-09-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fasten your seatbelts and brace yourself for an non-stop thrill ride","reviewBody":"Fasten your seatbelts and brace yourself for an non-stop thrill ride that will have you holding your breath from start to finish.

"Daylight" is one of the most intense movies I have seen in a long time. Sylvester Stallone gives one of his best performances in "Daylight" leading a group of civilians to safety after a New York tunnel engulfs in flames. Stallone works his magic as a former EMS chief sent in to save these civilians.

When I heard Stallone's name mentioned as part of the cast of "Daylight," I knew it would be a non-stop thrill ride; however, what I didn't realize it would be a thriller that had depth mixed in with everything else. "Daylight" is a credit to Stallone's ability and this remains one of his best roles to date.

Adding to this awesome film are Stallone's co-stars, which include Amy Brenneman, Viggo Mortensen, Jay O. Sanders and Stan Shaw. I enjoyed watching this ensemble work together because they seem to need no direction when on screen. It was as if they were really trapped in the tunnel. From the fear to the heroic actions they took, these actors were top notch.

I concede that "Daylight" is predictable. However, I disagree with those who say it hurts the film. My point is it doesn't matter whether a film is predictable, rather how it is presented. "Daylight" is presented with quite unique special effects, a plot with depth and endearing performances.

In addition to the excellent performances, "Daylight" had some of the best special effects I have seen. The explosion at the beginning of the movie was a work of art. I was in awe of how well the special effects were pulled off because I don't believe that "Daylight" would have worked as well as it did if they were done with less than 100 percent effort.

"Daylight" will keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70884,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"1996-12-06","keywords":"collapsing tunnel,electronic music score,blowout,pistol,director cameo","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000230/","name":"Sylvester Stallone","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000312/","name":"Amy Brenneman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001557/","name":"Viggo Mortensen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0003418/","name":"Rob Cohen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0062608/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0092018/","name":"Leslie Bohem"],"duration":"PT1H54M"</script><metacontent="

The aftermath of a drug deal as told from three different points of view." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0139239/","name":"Go","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzJhNGExMDYtMWEyOS00MzMxLWJiYTYtMDYxNTRmNjdjM2VlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The aftermath of a drug deal as told from three different points of view.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0139239/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"socrates4"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Such Great Fun","reviewBody":"After PULP FICTION a lot of films tried to emulate its format. But none came close to matching its success. GO has clear elements of PULP FICTION in it, but it does its own thing at the same time. This is the right way to make a movie that may be inspired by another great film while still branching out on its own.\n\nThe story is great fun from the first frame to the last. The characters are fun and believable and there is a lot of great dialog here. Every time I watch it I continue to be impressed, even still after all these years. It never lets me down and it never once lets up even for a second. Highly recommend.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":70095,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1999-04-09","keywords":"multiple storyline,multiple perspectives,drugs,drug deal,sex","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Go","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1655308569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDk5ZTIzM2MtMjU3MS00ZTgwLWJkYjEtODVmZDk0N2EyNGVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDk5ZTIzM2MtMjU3MS00ZTgwLWJkYjEtODVmZDk0N2EyNGVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001631/","name":"Sarah Polley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001542/","name":"Jay Mohr"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937930/","name":"Scott Wolf"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070311/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0060034/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0041864/","name":"John August"}],"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Lawa
programme.desc: Lori (Valérie Valois) i John (Ian Ziering) Wilsonowie nie są zbyt udanym małżeństwem. Często się kłócą, co negatywnie odbija się na ich relacjach z dziećmi. Oboje pracują w centrum reagowania kryzysowego. Pewnego dnia dowiadują się o wzroście aktywności gigantycznego wulkanu. Wydobywająca się z niego lawa zagraża nie tylko okolicznym terenom, ale i całej Ziemi. Lori i John muszą szybko wymyślić sposób, jak uchronić ludzkość przed efektami klęski żywiołowej.

programme.title: New Blood
Młoda krew
New Blood
programme.desc: New Blood: Directed by Michael Hurst. With John Hurt, Nick Moran, Carrie-Anne Moss, Shawn Wayans. One morning, the cops find eight dead bodies, gunshot victims, near a farmhouse. They also find a wounded man who tells the story of what happened. He is Alan White (Sir John Hurt), the father of a young woman awaiting a heart transplant. The night before, his wounded son Danny (Nick Moran) has come to him with a tale of a kidnapping gone wrong. Danny, whom Alan hasn't seen for eight years, offers a deal. If Alan will pose as a kidnapping victim, which will lead to his death, Danny will donate his heart for his sister's transplant. If Alan refuses, then Danny and his friends, the "new blood" hired to help with the kidnapping, will die. What will Alan do, and what's really going on here?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0177943/","name":"New Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3MTI5MDE0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDMzOTUyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"One morning, the cops find eight dead bodies, gunshot victims, near a farmhouse. They also find a wounded man who tells the story of what happened. programme.title: To End All Wars
Droga do wolności
To End All Wars
programme.desc: To End All Wars: Directed by David L. Cunningham. With Ciarán McMenamin, Robert Carlyle, Kiefer Sutherland, Mark Strong. A true story about four Allied POWs who endure harsh treatment from their Japanese captors during World War II while being forced to build a railroad through the Burmese jungle. Ultimately they find true freedom by forgiving their enemies. Based on the true story of Ernest Gordon." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0243609/","name":"To End All Wars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAyMDMxMTExOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzEwMjYyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A true story about four Allied POWs who endure harsh treatment from their Japanese captors during World War II while being forced to build a railroad through the Burmese jungle. Ultimately they find true freedom by forgiving their en","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0243609/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"luvvbuzz54"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"haunting and powerful story","reviewBody":"i saw this film as i tend to like films of this type about humanitarian stories, the fact that this one is true actual events made it even more powerful for me. it truly does bring home the facts of what the men from ww11 endured to make our world today as free as it is, and it is films like this one that should be shown as part of history curriculum in high schools. the film was brilliant, brutal, honest, extremely well acted, filmed and managed to touch me to the point of tears. Robert Carlyle was fantastic, as were the rest of the leads, i would give this film 9 out of 10 simply because 10 out of 10 would be perfection and perfection does not exist.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":10771,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","War"],"datePublished":"2001-09-02","keywords":"japanese prison camp,jungle,escape,tarsau burma,railway of death","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"To End All Wars","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2717319449","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNmYmUyYjctNGRhNy00NmMzLWFlZWEtODhmNGY0MmM2M2Q4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWNmYmUyYjctNGRhNy00NmMzLWFlZWEtODhmNGY0MmM2M2Q4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Freestyle Digital Media"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001015/","name":"Robert Carlyle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000662/","name":"Kiefer Sutherland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0573223/","name":"Ciarán McMenamin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192289/","name":"David L. programme.title: Hollywood Homicide
Wydział zabójstw, Hollywood
Hollywood Homicide
programme.desc:
Hollywood Homicide: Directed by Ron Shelton. With Harrison Ford, Josh Hartnett, Lena Olin, Bruce Greenwood. Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0329717/","name":"Hollywood Homicide","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU5Mjk1NzQ4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMTYxNzk5._V1_.jpg","description":"Two LAPD detectives who moonlight in other fields investigate the murder of an up-and-coming rap group.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0329717/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jpschapira"},"dateCreated":"2005-06-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"More unusual than expected","reviewBody":"Taking another chance on L.A, on the streets and more specifically on the police, as in "Dark Blue", Ron Shelton, a man of multiple themes, brings a new project to the table, which is called "Hollywood Homicide". The difference between this one and the latter one is that this is Hollywood, precisely. And when the beginning credits roll, and we're shown fifty "Hollywood" signs; it's obvious that they want us to realize that. Why would it be? 

The story about Ron Shelton meeting Robert Souza in the set of "Dark Blue" and them both getting together to write the script of "Hollywood Homicide", because Souza had been a cop before Interesting. However, in the same vein, "Dark Blue" is the portrait of a cruel reality; "Hollywood Homicide" is the satire of a shallow but real reality in the end. It's Hollywood, and it was a good premise to put some fun in the crime scenes, probably to make it "more dramatic than anything seen in Hollywood".

The other elements the plot offers go from action to crime, or vice versa. They created the murderer of a rap band, so they could mess a little bit with the music business, too. There we see the producers, the groups, the "showbiz" It's even related with theater and movies, because one of the main characters wants to be an actor; and in a decent comedic way, he's thinking about acting each time he's doing something; and he probably isn't that good.

I'm talking about K.C Calden; Josh Hartnett's character. He gives classes of movements to find the inner self. There, a lot of hot women assist and kiss him when they leave. In one scene, his partner tells him that he did for sex. "At first it was for sex, now it has become something spiritual", K.C answers, and at night, a hot woman is waiting for him in the "Jacuzzi". "How long has it been since the last time you got laid", K.C asks his partner. "It's not your business", the partner says. Then, he lets a man working as a prostitute into his car. When they discuss that, he says: "It was nothing, it was a man, a cop; a cop man".

This partner is Joe Gavilan, a pro in the police business played by a pro in the acting business. As he did with Kurt Russell in "Dark Blue", Shelton brings Harrison Ford back to the top of his game. With his character, based on writer Robert Souzas's own life, he has the best lines and he has a lot of fun. Antoine Sartain (Isaiah Washington) should be afraid of him; a man that has had sex, with Ruby (an over the top Lena Olin) and makes real estate business with producer Jerry Duran (the great Martin Landau) and Julius Armas (a correct Master P) while he's driving a car high speed. When he is told the composer of the rap group is still alive, he replies: "Somebody actually writes that s***?". He has had bad times, Bennie Macko (Bruce Greenwood) wants to get him, and in the best scene of the movie, he and K.C get interrogated. This scene is managed with camera changes between the two interrogating rooms, where in Joe's, his cell is always ringing; and in K.C's, he is "centering" himself spiritually. Joe's interrogator can't do anything, while K.C's interrogator (a woman) asks him to help her relax.

That scene stole the only laughs from me during the entire film. Keith David was also having fun in his Leo role, reprising some of the comic elements he gave to Lester Wallace in "Barbershop". More importantly, and if you were wondering, Shelton directs his actors perfectly, making a stupendous balance between the pro and the amateur, the old and the young; Harrison Ford and Josh Hartnett. Their chemistry is perfect, and one of the few reasons to watch the movie. In the end, their characters are nothing else but cops, in a film that leaves a lot of plot situations unresolved, is a bit long, not funny enough, but different from the gross humor that everyone finds easy to put on paper.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":36772,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2003-10-08","keywords":"criminal investigation,murder investigation,usa,united states,murder","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Hollywood Homicide","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2091712793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjU4NWNlZGEtMzQ3Yi00MzNiLTkxNTEtMDVhNTI4YTMwYzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjU4NWNlZGEtMzQ3Yi00MzNiLTkxNTEtMDVhNTI4YTMwYzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000148/","name":"Harrison Ford"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001326/","name":"Josh Hartnett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0913460/","name":"Isaiah Washington"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005421/","name":"Ron Shelton"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0177995/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0034610/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1226736/","name":"Robert Souza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005421/","name":"Ron Shelton"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dark Horse
Czarny koń
Dark Horse
programme.desc:
Dark Horse: Directed by Todd Solondz. With Melisa Young, Jordan Gelber, Selma Blair, Mia Farrow. Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1690455/","name":"Dark Horse","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjI5MDNjMDgtYjRlNy00ZGEyLWI3OTItZWIxYTcyY2FhNGU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two tricenarians in arrested development: an avid toy collector who is the dark horse of his family and a depressed woman on the rebound.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1690455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"krachtm"},"dateCreated":"2013-03-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"Uncomfortable satire","reviewBody":"The plot: An obnoxious man-child attempts an ill-fated romance with an equally broken woman, while coming to certain realizations about his life.

Dark Horse is not an easy movie to watch, but when have any Todd Solondz movies been easy to watch? His unflinching, brutally honest portrayals of flawed people make him popular with the indie crowd, but it's difficult to recommend his movies to anyone else. It's difficult not to identify with the parade of eternal losers of Solondz's movies, no matter how flawed they are, because, really, these people are us. We might try to deny it, of course, but the truth of the matter is that his movies are just too uncomfortably real for many people to enjoy. You might not be an awkward, depressed girl or an obnoxious, entitled man-child, but there's probably some aspect that you can relate to. If not, then you probably know someone like this. Solondz knows who we are, and he knows our society.

Dark Horse continues a rather surreal and artistic direction for Solondz. Fantasy, dreams, and reality all freely intermix. It might leave some audiences a bit confused, but it's usually pretty obvious which are which. In fact, I really enjoyed some of these scenes, because they opened the door to really inventive narrative and metaphor. In some ways, it was like David Lynch, but without the free-form stream-of-consciousness. These scenes really illustrate the characters better than any traditional scene could. The hilariously banal conversations are another nice touch. Anyone who appreciates irony will certainly enjoy them, though the irony-impaired, I think, will possibly hate this movie.

Solondz's characters have arguably never before been so depressed, bitter, and broken. If you're looking for an uplifting story, full of inspirational and likable characters, this is not the movie for you. Solondz is the undisputed master of strangely sympathetic portraits of society's biggest losers and weirdos. This one will hit pretty close to home for many geeks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5925,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-06-29","keywords":"hepatitis b,man wrapped in a towel,collectible,theater poster,poster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi516268569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTkyNjU2MTgxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDgwMTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Romance blooms between two thirty-somethings in arrested development: an avid toy collector who lives with his parents and a woman who is the dark horse of her family. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0312217/","name":"Jordan Gelber"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004757/","name":"Selma Blair"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000686/","name":"Christopher Walken"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316179/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001754/","name":"Todd Solondz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0543283/","name":"Harold Manning"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

Fighting
programme.desc: Fighting: Directed by Dito Montiel. With Channing Tatum, Terrence Howard, Zulay Henao, Michael Rivera. In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1082601/","name":"Fighting","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk5NjM3MjA5Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODI2MTQ0Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1082601/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Red_Identity"},"dateCreated":"2010-08-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Dull and flat out bad","reviewBody":"Fighting represents the new type of action film- no bang yet so boring. Not once did this film sneak up some excitement. It has some very dull characters played by some good actors that fail to give their characters some interest. For a film called Fighting, it has very little actual fighting until the last anti-climactic finale, which in all honesty, is quite boring. For an action film one can do much better, and not even the most brainless action fans will find this entertaining because for them it will have not enough action. So this film will please nobody... not enough action, no interesting plot or characters. Just another very forgettable action film like so many we have these days."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32741,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-11-04","keywords":"boyfriend girlfriend relationship,counterfeiting,reference to billy joel,reference to merlin,reference to king arthur","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fighting: Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1304560409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI1OTkyMDg5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjc4MjUyMg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI1OTkyMDg5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjc4MjUyMg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In New York City, a young counterfeiter (Tatum) is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist (Howard), who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit. programme.title: Szesnasty odcinek
programme.desc: Borykający się z problemami pisarz Nelson Keece (Gary Busey) zbiera materiały o nocnym życiu transwestytów. Przypadkiem staje się świadkiem działań seryjnego mordercy, Stefana (Arnold Vosloo). Mężczyźni zawierają znajomość. Chcąc pomóc sobie nawzajem, wchodzą w pewien makabryczny układ...

programme.title: Rough Draft
Rough Draft
programme.desc: Rough Draft: Directed by Joshua Wallace. With Gary Busey, Arnold Vosloo, Michael Madsen, Julia Campbell. A struggling freelance writer, while investigating the transvestite night life, stumbles across a serial killer in action. The two then strike up a bizarre partnership to document the killer's motives and handiwork as a possessed detective struggling with his own personal demons tries to solve the crimes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0120039/","name":"Rough Draft","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg1MzQ1NzI3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQ1ODQyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A struggling freelance writer, while investigating the transvestite night life, stumbles across a serial killer in action. The two then strike up a bizarre partnership to document the killer's motives and handiwork as a possessed det","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120039/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Romashka"},"dateCreated":"1998-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent! Many thanks to Mr.Gary Busey!","reviewBody":"This film is great and I enjoyed it very much! My favourite actor is Mr.Gary Busey and I think he gave an excellent portrayal of the journalist. I'm studying in journalist faculty so this film is very close to me. Now I understand what means to work as a journalist and I want to say THANK YOU for this to Mr.Busey. And besides many thanks to Mr.Busey for his thoughts about God, many of them help me to live. I also liked Mr.Arnold Vosloo as Stefan, but I know nothing about him as an actor, It's a pity but I've never seen him before. And my best wishes to Julia Campbell! I've seen her in "Santa-Barbara" and in my opinion she is a very nice and talented actress. Well, best wishes from Russia!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":768,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1998-05-18","keywords":"giallo,north american giallo,woman wears only a man's shirt,serial killer,transvestite","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Diary of a Serial Killer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi899809561","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU3MDFlZmQtZTU2Ny00ZDgxLWI3YjEtODgxNDVmZmQ4MWQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGU3MDFlZmQtZTU2Ny00ZDgxLWI3YjEtODgxNDVmZmQ4MWQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Ardustry Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000997/","name":"Gary Busey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000514/","name":"Michael Madsen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0903677/","name":"Arnold Vosloo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908726/","name":"Joshua Wallace"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014398/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002927/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0046114/","name":"Jennifer Badham"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service
NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service
Agenci NCIS
Navy NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service
programme.desc:
NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service: Created by Donald P. Bellisario, Don McGill. With Mark Harmon, David McCallum, Sean Murray, Pauley Perrette. The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0364845/","name":"NCIS: Naval Criminal Investigative Service","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjVlMjZhYzYtOGQxNC00OTQxLTk2NzEtMWFmMmNhODA4YjYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ3MDgwNjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"The cases of the Naval Criminal Investigative Service's Washington, D.C. Major Case Response Team, led by Special Agent Leroy Jethro Gibbs.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0364845/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mch2469-955-827475"},"dateCreated":"2014-03-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Things ain't what they used to be...!","reviewBody":"I started watching this series a few years after it started and went back through previous seasons to catch up...

Admittedly you need to suspend any sense of reality to enjoy this show as with many other similar shows... however thats a good thing as TV shows are about escaping and stepping into an alternate world...with alternate characters...

So with that in mind I have enjoyed the shows..... I was never a lover of Ziva character but it worked within the team of characters... a balance I guess you could say...

I have been watching since the new character to replace Ziva arrived and although as a character, Ellie really doesn't work for me.... the character itself isn't in line with the shows balance...

I know some reviews mention her traits and methods within the show... that to be honest isn't the problem for me... its the way that character sits within the team and ultimately the show.... as we all know every character is unrealistic and more of a caricature.... so this new character and her traits aren't for me the issue...its the way that particular character just doesn't work within the team and balance of the show.... by deliberately avoiding going for a similar character as Ziva the makers have tried to go a different way and to me it ain't worked.... I have seen a few guest characters that would work better and create good relationships and open more story lines... this character ain't one of them...I find myself forwarding her scenes to avoid the irritation her character brings...I have only found myself being irritated by one other character during the shows seasons and that is the Coast Guard Agent Borin she was terrible...so OTT at trying to be something she clearly couldn't be .... like some sort of female Gibbs character... she was really irritating both as a character and as the actress trying to play that role ... maybe a different actress would have made that work but certainly not Diane Neal...

I hope the makers of the show do change this new character..I can see myself drifting away from this show if they don't...

But then maybe the other side of the coin is that the show is not putting out the same level of episodes and story lines that it used to... and my dislike of that new character is more about the overall than just the that..?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":130580,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2003-09-23","keywords":"goth girl,babe scientist,special agent,naval criminal investigative service,police procedural","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001319/","name":"Mark Harmon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0564724/","name":"David McCallum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615266/","name":"Sean Murray"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0114905/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066107/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0183875/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0069074/","name":"Donald P. Bellisario"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1453745/","name":"Don McGill"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"NCIS: The Eigth Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi291414809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJiZmZiNGUtNWFhMi00MzM0LWEzMjAtMTM2NzMyYzQzMjg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDJiZmZiNGUtNWFhMi00MzM0LWEzMjAtMTM2NzMyYzQzMjg5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for NCIS: The Eighth Season"}}</script><metacontent="
