programme.title: Critical Thinking
Debiut
Critical Thinking
programme.desc:
Critical Thinking: Directed by John Leguizamo. With John Leguizamo, Rachel Bay Jones, Michael Kenneth Williams, Corwin C. Tuggles. The true story of the Miami Jackson High School chess team which was the first inner city team to win the U.S. National Chess Championship." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7870102/","name":"Critical Thinking","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzhiMzM0YTItZjAyOC00NGEzLWE5Y2ItN2E4MGM3MDhkNzY1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The true story of the Miami Jackson High School chess team which was the first inner city team to win the U.S. National Chess Championship.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7870102/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"t-wildthing-618-802138"},"dateCreated":"2020-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love it!!!!","reviewBody":"I've always liked movies about teachers fighting to bring out the best of their students. Most of these movies show very dedicated teachers who not only love their job, but go the extra mile for their students. There are a lot of these movies, Stand and Deliver, Good Will Hunting, Dangerous Minds, The Ron Clark Story, just to mention a few; but in this case it involves a game that many may play but not all fully understand its importance beyond the game.

It's great to see how they actually explained chess with historic facts and that the actors played the game for real. It's also important to mention that these kind of movies make a difference in reminding kids to pursue not only their dreams, but most importantly the opportunities that open up to them.

Everybody has a chance to shine in life no matter where you come from or your ethnicity, it's all about wanting it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-04","keywords":"city,miami florida,chess,chess game,chess player","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3597319705","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWZmZjYwMzctMzdjYi00YTViLWFjNWItOWZlNGIxMDExOGEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWZmZjYwMzctMzdjYi00YTViLWFjNWItOWZlNGIxMDExOGEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXZ3ZXNsZXk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Based on a true story from 1998, five LatinX and Black teenagers from the toughest underserved ghetto in Miami fight their way into the National Chess Championship under the guidance of their unconventional but inspirational teacher."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000491/","name":"John Leguizamo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6544405/","name":"Rachel Bay Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0931324/","name":"Michael Kenneth Williams"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000491/","name":"John Leguizamo"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0831117/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0277025/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0726369/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1996918/","name":"Dito Montiel"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

My Salinger Year
programme.desc: My Salinger Year: Directed by Philippe Falardeau. With Margaret Qualley, Sigourney Weaver, Douglas Booth, Seána Kerslake. A college grad takes a clerical job working for the literary agent of the renowned, reclusive writer J.D. Salinger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2222052/","name":"My Salinger Year","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzNDM4YWMtZWE5Ny00MTliLWEzY2ItODU0NmE2ZTUzMDhlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTE1MzI2NzIz._V1_.jpg","description":"A college grad takes a clerical job working for the literary agent of the renowned, reclusive writer J.D. Salinger.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2222052/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Gordon-11"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Heartwarming","reviewBody":"It's not an eventful story, but somehow it really engages you with realistic characters and an engaging story. I find it heartwarming."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2982,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2021-03-05","keywords":"writer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer (2021)","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi728351001","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM5NjRkMzMtY2QyMi00Y2NmLWEyOTQtY2IwNWRmOTVmNTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM5NjRkMzMtY2QyMi00Y2NmLWEyOTQtY2IwNWRmOTVmNTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"New York in the 90s: After leaving graduate school to pursue her dream of becoming a writer, Joanna (Margaret Qualley) gets hired as an assistant to Margaret (Sigourney Weaver), the stoic and old-fashioned literary agent of J. D. Salinger. Fluctuating between poverty and glamour, she spends her days in a plush, wood-paneled office – where dictaphones and typewriters still reign and agents doze off after three-martini lunches – and her nights in a sink-less Brooklyn apartment with her socialist boyfriend. Joanna’s main task is processing Salinger’s voluminous fan mail, but as she reads the heart-wrenching letters from around the world, she becomes reluctant to send the agency’s impersonal standard letter and impulsively begins personalizing the responses. The results are both humorous and moving, as Joanna, while using the great writer’s voice, begins to discover her own."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4960279/","name":"Margaret Qualley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3150488/","name":"Douglas Booth"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265852/","name":"Philippe Falardeau"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0089507/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044330/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0265852/","name":"Philippe Falardeau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5117507/","name":"Joanna Smith Rakoff"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

A "tax collector" working for a local crime lord finds his family's safety compromised when the rival of his boss shows up in L.A. and upends the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8461224/","name":"The Tax Collector","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmFmZTdhYmItNjIyZS00ZjVlLWFjZjgtMjMyMDA5ZmVjNzE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDM2NDM2MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A "tax collector" working for a local crime lord finds his family's safety compromised when the rival of his boss shows up in L.A. and upends the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8461224/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"Are you serious?","reviewBody":"This movie has potential but everything goes to heck because of the extremely bad script. Last, Fx's look cheap and acting amateurish, except from Shia. But...\n\nSo, overall a wasted opportunity to create a great movie. Shame on Director 's and writers. programme.title: Die Hard
Szklana pułapka
Die Hard
programme.desc:
Die Hard: Directed by John McTiernan. With Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson, Paul Gleason. An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0095016/","name":"Die Hard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjRlNDUxZjAtOGQ4OC00OTNlLTgxNmQtYTBmMDgwZmNmNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0095016/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cherold"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Classic action movie","reviewBody":"I first saw this movie a thousand years ago, but have been meaning to rewatch it since I started reading the debates on whether it can be considered a Christmas movie. But every Christmas when I suggested it to my girlfriend she would reply, "maybe later."

And then, after several years, we watched it. And while she's not always a big action-movie person, she loved it. The story is engaging. Bruce Willis has a way with a snappy line. The movie is full of snappy lines. It's exciting.

Some elements don't make any sense. It's certainly pure nonsense. And while it may technically have the features of a Christmas movie, it sure ain't Christmasy. But it is lots of fun and if you haven't seen it you really should. IMDb data; ttnr: 0095016, Title: Die Hard, --- Description: Die Hard: Directed by John McTiernan. With Bruce Willis, Bonnie Bedelia, Reginald VelJohnson, Paul Gleason. An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0095016/","name":"Die Hard","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjRlNDUxZjAtOGQ4OC00OTNlLTgxNmQtYTBmMDgwZmNmNjkxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzkwMjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","description":"An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0095016/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"cherold","dateCreated":"2021-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Classic action movie","reviewBody":"I first saw this movie a thousand years ago, but have been meaning to rewatch it since I started reading the debates on whether it can be considered a Christmas movie. But every Christmas when I suggested it to my girlfriend she would reply, "maybe later."

And then, after several years, we watched it. And while she's not always a big action-movie person, she loved it. The story is engaging. Bruce Willis has a way with a snappy line. The movie is full of snappy lines. It's exciting.

Some elements don't make any sense. It's certainly pure nonsense. And while it may technically have the features of a Christmas movie, it sure ain't Christmasy. But it is lots of fun and if you haven't seen it you really should. Even if it's not Christmas.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":823168,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1988-07-20","keywords":"hostage,one against many,los angeles california,christmas,heist","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer: 30th Anniversary Christmas Edition","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3895704089","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDViZDAzMjAtY2E1YS00OThkLWE2YTMtYzBmYWRjMWY0MDhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDViZDAzMjAtY2E1YS00OThkLWE2YTMtYzBmYWRjMWY0MDhkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRzdGFzaWVr._V1_.jpg","description":"Bruce Willis is John McClane in the film that launched the billion-dollar 'Die Hard' action franchise.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000246/","name":"Bruce Willis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000614/","name":"Alan Rickman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000889/","name":"Bonnie Bedelia"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001532/","name":"John McTiernan"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0119038/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019968/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0861636/","name":"Roderick Thorp","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0835732/","name":"Jeb Stuart","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0211823/","name":"Steven E. de Souza"],"duration":"PT2H12M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Il cacciatore
Il cacciatore
Il Cacciatore. Polowanie na mafię
Il Cacciatore
programme.desc:
Il cacciatore: With Francesco Montanari, Miriam Dalmazio, Edoardo Pesce, Francesco Foti. In 1993 Italy was at war with the mafia, this is the story of the servants of the Nation that fought that war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt8118950/","name":"Il cacciatore","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWU2YzVlMDQtYTRlMy00MGM3LTlhMTUtOWZlZTAzNzJhOTlhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTY2MzkxMjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1993 Italy was at war with the mafia, this is the story of the servants of the Nation that fought that war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8118950/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Tweekums"},"dateCreated":"2021-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Hunter (Season One)","reviewBody":"This Italian series tells of the war against the Cosa Nostra in the 1990s; in particular the hunt for Leoluca Bagarella, a senior Mafioso and his associates and a child they are believed to have kidnapped. Saverio Barone, a young prosecutor recently recruited to the Anti-Mafia squad, is among those leading the hunt; a hunt he becomes obsessed with. He is partnered with Carlo Mazza, a more experienced prosecutor. Over the course of the first series we see events from the perspective of these prosecutors; Bagarella and his associates, most notably his driver Tony.

I really enjoyed the first season of this series and hope the second becomes available here soon. The tone is understandably fairly bleak... anybody hoping for the fun of Sicily based crime drama 'Inspector Montalbano' will be sorely disappointed! The series doesn't shy away from showing Mafia crimes; there are some fairly gruelling scenes of torture and murder and as hunt for the boy drags on for months and years with him chained up and his chance of survival not that great there is a sense of bleakness. The opening of each episode reminds us that this is based on real events, but with details changed for dramatic purposes; this helps keep the viewer on edge, especially if like me you don't know how the real story ends. The cast does a really impressive job bringing their characters to life... not 'larger than life'; the Mafiosi are shown as fairly ordinary people who happen to be violent criminals rather than obviously evil villains, which explains why they aren't easily caught. Overall I'd certainly recommend this.

These comments are based on watching the series in Italian with English subtitles.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":624,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-03-14","keywords":"servant","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3036319/","name":"Francesco Montanari"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3933829/","name":"Miriam Dalmazio"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3034455/","name":"Edoardo Pesce"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0503595/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044017/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0068775/"}]}</script><metacontent="

Saverio Barone, a young prosecutor recently recruited to the Anti-Mafia squad, is among those leading the hunt; a hunt he becomes obsessed with. He is partnered with Carlo Mazza, a more experienced prosecutor. Over the course of the first series we see events from the perspective of these prosecutors; Bagarella and his associates, most notably his driver Tony.

I really enjoyed the first season of this series and hope the second becomes available here soon. The tone is understandably fairly bleak... anybody hoping for the fun of Sicily based crime drama 'Inspector Montalbano' will be sorely disappointed! The series doesn't shy away from showing Mafia crimes; there are some fairly gruelling scenes of torture and murder and as hunt for the boy drags on for months and years with him chained up and his chance of survival not that great there is a sense of bleakness. The opening of each episode reminds us that this is based on real events, but with details changed for dramatic purposes; this helps keep the viewer on edge, especially if like me you don't know how the real story ends. The cast does a really impressive job bringing their characters to life... not 'larger than life'; the Mafiosi are shown as fairly ordinary people who happen to be violent criminals rather than obviously evil villains, which explains why they aren't easily caught. Overall I'd certainly recommend this.

programme.title: American Hangman
Sędzia i kat
American Hangman
programme.desc:
American Hangman: Directed by Wilson Coneybeare. With Donald Sutherland, Vincent Kartheiser, Oliver Dennis, Paul Braunstein. 2 men are chained up in a basement. The captor has cameras aimed at them and is streaming it on the internet - turning it into a "trial" on the held, retired judge's last court case. The viewers become the jurors." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8975028/","name":"American Hangman","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTE0ODY5OTU1MTReQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDcyNDE1ODYz._V1_.jpg","description":"2 men are chained up in a basement. The captor has cameras aimed at them and is streaming it on the internet - turning it into a "trial" on the held, retired judge's last court case. The viewers become the jurors.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8975028/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ops-52535"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"sutherland are still alive","reviewBody":"Well , this is a film that tells the story of how random life can be and what the consequences may be of living, and who are the best to judge that , you, me , the jury,the people or simply the judge.....law isnt my strongest part ,and american law are far to complex to understand under these circumstances, coup d'etat or marshal laws and pure anarchi are some clues to this film

donald sutherland has grown old for sure, but he still delivers, and makes this film very suspensfilled and keeps you on the edge of the chair almost till the end. its a new angle of involving social media as a max factor in the movie world, and passes through very well, though the truth-factor are questionable.

to summarize,its yet another example of the power of going viral on social media. recomendable it is.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3391,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"genre":["Thriller"],"datePublished":"2019-03-09","keywords":"internet,judge,jury,livestreaming,internet search","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"American Hangman","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1751759385","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzgwYmM5NmUtOGY4Yi00ZDAyLTg0N2MtNTFkNTUyZjdjY2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzgwYmM5NmUtOGY4Yi00ZDAyLTg0N2MtNTFkNTUyZjdjY2I4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000661/","name":"Donald Sutherland"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0440229/","name":"Vincent Kartheiser"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0219530/","name":"Oliver Dennis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174551/","name":"Wilson Coneybeare"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0710805/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0174551/","name":"Wilson Coneybeare"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

Primal
programme.desc: Primal: Created by Genndy Tartakovsky. With Aaron LaPlante, Tom Kenny, Jon Olson, Laëtitia Eïdo. A caveman and a dinosaur bond over shared tragedy and work together to survive in a perilous prehistoric world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt10332508/","name":"Primal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjk3Y2U3NjEtMjNhYi00YTZmLWEzOTgtZWI4N2Y4NzlmNWExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODk2MzQ0OTc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A caveman and a dinosaur bond over shared tragedy and work together to survive in a perilous prehistoric world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10332508/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"computermediajames"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Man and Beast forging a strange yet powerful bond in this beautiful, graphic series","reviewBody":"A thrilling, passionate show with cool prehistoric dinosaurs and creatures - you build a bond with it's two relatable leads and understand their anger, sadness, fear, amusement, happiness and curiosity; and neither even speaks a word. The animation and art style is fantastic and the jurassic landscape that Spear and Fang inhabit is immersive and atmospheric. programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: La Gomera
La Gomera
programme.desc:
La Gomera: Directed by Corneliu Porumboiu. With Vlad Ivanov, Catrinel Marlon, Rodica Lazar, Sabin Tambrea. Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7921248/","name":"La Gomera","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI4MjM1NTctMmQwYy00ZDE3LTllOTAtODRlNjJkMTg1MDAwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDA4NzMyOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Not everything is as it seems for Cristi, a policeman who plays both sides of the law. Embarking with the beautiful Gilda on a high-stakes heist, both will have to navigate the twists and turns of corruption, treachery and deception.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7921248/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mjfhhh"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"a rewarding experience for those who will stick with it until the end","reviewBody":"Cristi is a middle aged undercover police officer with mommy issues who is trying to find the location of some stolen money. So he goes to a remote island to learn a whistling language that will allow him to communicate with the criminals from a distance. There he rekindles a relationship with his old flame and his priorities change. As both the criminals and his colleagues are onto Cristi what choices will he make to come out clean of his predicament? A clever game of cops and robbers ensues.

Summing up this multi layered, not always coherent plot, is not an easy task. THE WHISTLERS takes a long time to get going but it's many elements come together building up to something special. Heavy on movie references it is heavily inspired by Tarantino movies, although the style of the cinematography is rather dull.

The script on paper must look great, but this is the case where a writer should let go of his work and let someone else direct. Cornelliu Porumboiu helmed 13 films but seems to be still searching for his directing style. While all the cast do their job well, the motives of their characters for the majority of the film are obscure to say the least.

But if this is the originality you are looking for THE WHISTLERS is for you. With good timing and a genuine sense of wit it is a rewarding experience for those who will stick with it until the end.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5046,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-09-13","keywords":"female rear nudity,canary islands,police detective,policeman,police officer","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1044168473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIyOWU0MWYtY2IzZS00ZWMwLThkMDgtYWU5MDA2MjVmMWEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGIyOWU0MWYtY2IzZS00ZWMwLThkMDgtYWU5MDA2MjVmMWEwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0412096/","name":"Vlad Ivanov"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5054840/","name":"Catrinel Marlon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1120715/","name":"Rodica Lazar"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717949/","name":"Corneliu Porumboiu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0180401/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167020/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0245364/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1717949/","name":"Corneliu Porumboiu"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dead Trigger
Dead Trigger - Oddział śmierci
Dead Trigger
programme.desc:
Dead Trigger: Directed by Mike Cuff, Scott Windhauser. With Dolph Lundgren, Autumn Reeser, Brooke Johnston, Romeo Miller. A mysterious virus has killed billions and turned many others into bloodthirsty zombies. Unable to stop the virus, the government develops a video game, "Dead Trigger," that mirrors the terrifying events that curse the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5662550/","name":"Dead Trigger","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ3ZjFmMDQtNDQwMC00Mzc4LTg3NWUtYTc1YTdkYTI5NmQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious virus has killed billions and turned many others into bloodthirsty zombies. Unable to stop the virus, the government develops a video game, "Dead Trigger," that mirrors the terrifying events that curse the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5662550/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"melgrubb-48952"},"dateCreated":"2019-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty good for a student film","reviewBody":"Unfortunately this was a "professional" job. I loves me some Dolph, but this one was hard to get through. I just pretended it said "Troma" on the case, and it made it a little easier to take.

Here's an example of the stellar writing: Forgettable character #1: I've never shot a gun before Forgettable character #2: Speak for yourself, I was... something something blah blah blah

Um... Forgettable character #1 WAS speaking for himself. The sentence literally started with "I've". Please, people... pass any English scripts by a native English speaker to look for such obvious problems with common phrases. I wouldn't even call this an idiomatic expression, just an abject failure to understand a very straightforward sentence.

Another example: At one point, the heavily armed characters pile into a pickup truck to make their getaway, and the four in the bed of the truck continue firing at zombies BEHIND THEM as they speed away. What is that meant to accomplish apart from wasting ammo? A mysterious virus has killed billions and turned many others into bloodthirsty zombies. Unable to stop the virus, the government develops a video game, "Dead Trigger," that mirrors the terrifying events that curse the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt5662550/","name":"Dead Trigger","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmQ3ZjFmMDQtNDQwMC00Mzc4LTg3NWUtYTc1YTdkYTI5NmQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzQwMTY2Nzk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A mysterious virus has killed billions and turned many others into bloodthirsty zombies. Unable to stop the virus, the government develops a video game, "Dead Trigger," that mirrors the terrifying events that curse the world.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt5662550/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"melgrubb-48952","dateCreated":"2019-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pretty good for a student film","reviewBody":"Unfortunately this was a "professional" job. I loves me some Dolph, but this one was hard to get through. I just pretended it said "Troma" on the case, and it made it a little easier to take.

Here's an example of the stellar writing: Forgettable character #1: I've never shot a gun before Forgettable character #2: Speak for yourself, I was... something something blah blah blah

Um... Forgettable character #1 WAS speaking for himself. The sentence literally started with "I've". Please, people... pass any English scripts by a native English speaker to look for such obvious problems with common phrases. I wouldn't even call this an idiomatic expression, just an abject failure to understand a very straightforward sentence.

Another example: At one point, the heavily armed characters pile into a pickup truck to make their getaway, and the four in the bed of the truck continue firing at zombies BEHIND THEM as they speed away. What is that meant to accomplish apart from wasting ammo? Luckily (for them) they rarely acknowledge the need to reload and never EVER run out of bullets, or this would have been a much shorter movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1068,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.3,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2019-05-03","keywords":"game,low budget sci fi movie,zombie,year 2025,boxing","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"DEAD TRIGGER Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1140636953","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFhZDUzZTItNzJiNi00MGMwLWI0Y2YtN2Q0NGUyYmVjYmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWFhZDUzZTItNzJiNi00MGMwLWI0Y2YtN2Q0NGUyYmVjYmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000185/","name":"Dolph Lundgren","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1032208/","name":"Autumn Reeser","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1498137/","name":"Brooke Johnston"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0191242/","name":"Mike Cuff","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934698/","name":"Scott Windhauser"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0335687/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0431931/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316584/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5566894/","name":"Heinz Treschnitzer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0191242/","name":"Mike Cuff","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0934698/","name":"Scott Windhauser"],"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Terminal
Terminal
programme.desc:
Terminal: Directed by Vaughn Stein. With Margot Robbie, Simon Pegg, Dexter Fletcher, Mike Myers. A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4463816/","name":"Terminal","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmEzOGVmNWQtZDBiMC00OTk4LTg3OWQtMzc2MzgxNjlkY2JjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxODk2OTU@._V1_.jpg","description":"A film noir taking place in a train terminal at night. Add 2 male assassins, female assassin, waitress, teacher, janitor and crime boss. Add revenge. Who says mystery is a lost art?","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4463816/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"iantrader"},"dateCreated":"2018-05-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worth watching but not as good as it thinks it is","reviewBody":"I'll start with my usual writer/director moan although this isn't as bad as most, and Vaughn Stein almost pulls it off.

It's visually stunning, has some superb actors - Margot Robbie in particular - but the convoluted story-telling style and, indeed, the plot, make it less than it should have been. You'll have to keep your eyes and ears open and resist the temptation to walk out or switch off 20-30 mins into the movie. The stopy lines do come together, if slightly haphazardly.

There are some nice twists. One or two you'll probably have an inkling of. One you won't as there's no foreshadowing at all, and although it ties everything (mostly) together, you may well feel cheated as the writer(*/director) swaggers about thinking what a clever writer I am!

Still, immerse yourself in a comic/noir-ish nightmare and see what you think.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21170,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-05-11","keywords":"bare chested male bondage,tied to a bed,revenge,written by director,wager","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi671922201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0Y2YwZDktYzc3Mi00ZjE3LWI3NmMtNjZiYmFlYTBlZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzU0Y2YwZDktYzc3Mi00ZjE3LWI3NmMtNjZiYmFlYTBlZTE0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the dark heart of a sprawling, anonymous city, 'Terminal' follows the twisting tales of two assassins carrying out a sinister mission, a teacher battling a fatal illness, an enigmatic janitor and a curious waitress leading a dangerous double life. Murderous consequences unravel in the dead of night as their lives all intertwine at the hands of a mysterious criminal mastermind hell-bent on revenge."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3053338/","name":"Margot Robbie"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0670408/","name":"Simon Pegg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002077/","name":"Dexter Fletcher"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2389363/","name":"Vaughn Stein"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0465725/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0482754/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0303030/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2389363/","name":"Vaughn Stein"}],"duration":"PT1H35M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: Aktualności filmowe+
programme.desc: W cotygodniowym programie zostają przedstawione najbardziej interesujące wydarzenia ze świata kina. Pojawiają się wywiady z osobami związanymi z branżą filmową, prowadzone są rozmowy na temat premier, nowości muzycznych i teatralnych.

programme.title: Miasta rytm: Zrabowane dzieła sztuki
programme.desc: W trakcie II wojny światowej z Polski zniknęły setki tysięcy bezcennych dzieł sztuki. Zarówno niemieccy, jak i radzieccy okupanci masowo wywozili obrazy i rzeźby. Nie wszystkie udało się odzyskać. Obecnie wiele z tych polskich zbiorów rozsianych jest po całym świecie. Historyk sztuki Jerzy S. Majewski przybliża losy tych zrabowanych dóbr. Snuje opowieść o skradzionym dorobku wielu wspaniałych artystów i wyjaśnia, co się z nim dokładnie stało.

credits.actor: Anna Mikhalkova, Evgeniy Grishkovets, Tatyana Dogileva, Elizaveta Kononova, Mariya Andreeva, Aglaya Tarasova, Aleksandra Bortich

programme.title: "Zasada przyjemności" - making of
programme.desc: Lokalną społecznością Dobrowic wstrząsa śmierć młodej dziewczyny. Tymczasem w mieście zjawia się nieznajomy mężczyzna, Paweł Zawadzki. To nauczyciel z renomowanej warszawskiej szkoły, który podejmuje pracę na prowincji. Paweł rozpoczyna własne śledztwo. Kiedy chodzi o zbrodnię, nie ma miejsca na półprawdy. Nikt jednak nie chce rozmawiać z przybyszem, mimo że wszyscy mieszkańcy miasta się znają i wiedzą o sobie wszystko. Paweł zostaje sam.

credits.actor: Maciej Stuhr, Magdalena Cielecka, Michalina Łabacz, Eliza Rycembel, Zofia Wichłacz, Aleksandra Popławska, Robert Gonera, Piotr Głowacki, Krzysztof Pieczyński

programme.title: Okno u sąsiadów
The Neighbors' Window
programme.desc: Alli (Maria Dizzia) jest młodą matką, sfrustrowaną rutyną i mężem. Jej życie zostaje wywrócone do góry nogami, kiedy dwóch beztroskich nastolatków wprowadza się do budynku po drugiej stronie ulicy. Kobieta odkrywa, że może bez przeszkód podglądać ich mieszkanie.

programme.title: Czy na pewno umiesz gotować?
programme.desc: Mistrzowie domowej kuchni poznają prawdę o swoim kulinarnym talencie. Bohaterem każdego odcinka jest osoba zgłoszona przez rodzinę. Każdy myśli, że został wybrany ze względu na swoje zdolności. Tymczasem okazuje się, że bliscy mają już dość przesolonej lasagne, mdłej pomidorówki lub twardych schabowych, ale boją się powiedzieć to wprost kucharzowi amatorowi. Znany szef kuchni Andrzej Polan ocenia umiejętności swoich gości i pomaga im podszkolić się w trudnej sztuce gotowania.

programme.desc: Czwarty sezon dokumentalnej serii poświęconej najlepszym zawodowym komikom. W każdym odcinku widzowie poznają biografie kolejnych zabawnych ludzi, a także zobaczą archiwalne nagrania z ich najśmieszniejszymi występami.

credits.actor: Lyndy Saville

programme.title: News+
programme.desc: Podsumowanie najważniejszych wydarzeń z aren sportowych. Omówienie sukcesów, rekordów i porażek. Program prowadzą zamiennie m.in. Piotr Karpiński, Piotr Salak, Wojciech Zawioła i Gabriel Rogaczewski.

programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: 25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
25 lat niewinności. Sprawa Tomka Komendy
programme.desc:
25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy: Directed by Jan Holoubek. With Piotr Trojan, Agata Kulesza, Dariusz Chojnacki, Jan Frycz. The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11368998/","name":"25 lat niewinnosci. Sprawa Tomka Komendy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2E3YWNhMTgtMzRiZS00N2UxLWJkYzEtOGYyMWFhNDhlZmExXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTEwMTY3NDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The ordinary life of Tomasz Komenda is turned upside down when he is wrongly accused of brutal murder and sentenced to 25 years in prison.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11368998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"v-26640"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"A powerful movie about how person can be sentenced on circumstantial evidences.","reviewBody":"Tomasz Komenda was sentenced about 3 years after the crime had been committed basing on simple idea - 'find me a man and we fill forge evidences against him'. What this move does not show is that at that time Attorney General, now deceased Lech Kaczynski had been urged that a killer is found and sentenced to silence medias hysteria and coverage about brutal murder and rape of that young girl. Later when the murder was put on Tomasz, he was publicly defamed by Lech Kaczynski. Despite Mr L. Kaczynski death in Smolensk plane crash and after Tomasz was exonerated, no polish public institution nor police have never apologized Tomasz for their actions, which is a standard practice in western democratic countries.

Not much changed in post-soviet bloc however after 1990 in terms of judiciary mentality. Human Rights Watch estimates that 1-3% of sentences in Poland may be those in which innocent people are sentenced just because either suspects were threatened by police to force to confess by beatings. No effective police control and their procedures exists as of today. You may call it a mafia or not but I believe it's not far from truth in Poland.

Personally I believe his family did not do enough to get him out of prison, a good lawyer would smash the case easily and he is worth every money, why did it happen 15 years later is a mystery for me.

As Tomasz said after his release, there are no good people in prisons , there is only evil.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":864,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-09-18","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3825975/","name":"Piotr Trojan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0474492/","name":"Agata Kulesza"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2621963/","name":"Dariusz Chojnacki"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0185099/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1733303/","name":"Andrzej Golda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1450132/","name":"Jan Holoubek"}],"duration":"PT1H56M"}</script><metacontent="

What this move does not show is that at that time Attorney General, now deceased Lech Kaczynski had been urged that a killer is found and sentenced to silence medias hysteria and coverage about brutal murder and rape of that young girl. Kaczynski death in Smolensk plane crash and after Tomasz was exonerated, no polish public institution nor police have never apologized Tomasz for their actions, which is a standard practice in western democratic countries.

programme.title: Jasminum
Jasminum
programme.desc: Jasminum: Directed by Jan Jakub Kolski. With Justyna Bartoszewicz, Grazyna Blecka-Kolska, Marta Dabrowska, Grzegorz Damiecki. The peaceful world of a monastery, in a small town Jasmine, is destroyed by the arrival of monument restorers, Natasha, along with her daughter Eugenia. The legend associated with the monastery bode revelation in him a saint in the near future. Despite initial reluctance, Natasha starts the maintenance of the image stored there. The secrets of the monastery are unraveled: the unhappy lovers bodies placed in the catacombs, the secret elixir of love, created with the smell of the monks." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0778749/","name":"Jasminum","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDkyNzM5ZmQtYTFmNi00ZGI3LWI2MjctNzYwMDAwOWM1ZTYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc4MzI2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The peaceful world of a monastery, in a small town Jasmine, is destroyed by the arrival of monument restorers, Natasha, along with her daughter Eugenia. The legend associated with the monastery bode revelation in him a saint in the n","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0778749/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"voron-5"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent!","reviewBody":"Well....to be honest I am a huge fan of Masters Gayos and Peczka so their participation was the main force that made me to get JASMINUM and my God! the movie is AMAZING! From the beginning to the end...I was embraced by a cascade of colors, sounds and scents...yes - SCENTS for as one of previous reviewers said - You can literally FEEL the scent of the mysterious fragrances! I'd compare my impressions to those I got after watching "Amelie Poulain". Sound - amazing Picture - incredible Actors - superb! Without a doubt I can predict a bright future to Polish cinematography if there would be more that one of a kind (IMO - so far) movie I am talking about! \n\nIf you are looking for something different, if you are tired to the all like Hollywood "matrix" movies - JASMINUM is the very right answer!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1277,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"genre":["Comedy","Romance"],"datePublished":"2006-05-05","keywords":"voice over narration,woman beater,sex,scent,runaway groom","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2702136/","name":"Justyna Bartoszewicz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0088111/","name":"Grazyna Blecka-Kolska"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0196449/","name":"Marta Dabrowska"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464383/","name":"Jan Jakub Kolski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0004670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0464383/","name":"Jan Jakub Kolski"}],"duration":"PT1H55M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: A Love Yarn
Po nitce do miłości
A Love Yarn
programme.desc: A Love Yarn: Directed by Peter Burger. With Anna Hutchison, Simon Arblaster, Olivia Tennet, Annie Whittle. The owner of a quaint New Zealand yarn shop, Sophie Markham, gets her world flipped upside down after learning her top supplier of yarn, King Farms, is stopping production. Much to her surprise, the charming yet stuck-in-his-ways Samuel King has traveled all the way from New York to audit the business model of the farm. Desperate to keep her shop going, Sophie convinces Samuel to give her two weeks to learn the ropes of yarn spinning and raise enough money to buy the mill herself. With Samuel's help, Sophie comes up with a fundraising plan to host a "knit-off" and auction at the local makers market. However, when the two weeks come to an end Sophie finds herself at a crossroads of business and romance. IMDb data; ttnr: 12786794, Title: A Love Yarn, --- Description: A Love Yarn: Directed by Peter Burger. With Anna Hutchison, Simon Arblaster, Olivia Tennet, Annie Whittle. The owner of a quaint New Zealand yarn shop, Sophie Markham, gets her world flipped upside down after learning her top supplier of yarn, King Farms, is stopping production. Much to her surprise, the charming yet stuck-in-his-ways Samuel King has traveled all the way from New York to audit the business model of the farm. Desperate to keep her shop going, Sophie convinces Samuel to give her two weeks to learn the ropes of yarn spinning and raise enough money to buy the mill herself. With Samuel's help, Sophie comes up with a fundraising plan to host a "knit-off" and auction at the local makers market. However, when the two weeks come to an end Sophie finds herself at a crossroads of business and romance. Could she have misinterpreted Samuel's growing romantic interest in her as just business all along?" data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12786794/","name":"A Love Yarn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWI2OWIwODMtNzdhMS00MmFkLWFiMTktNDlkY2MwMzY5MWUzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTk1NzUwMA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The owner of a quaint New Zealand yarn shop, Sophie Markham, gets her world flipped upside down after learning her top supplier of yarn, King Farms, is stopping production. programme.title: Jak wyspać się pod wodą
programme.desc: Podwodni odkrywcy Ghislain i Emmanuelle Bardout wyruszają w niesamowitą podróż do serca rafy koralowej Moorea. Dzięki podwodnej kapsule, pozwalającej im żyć pod wodą przez całą dobę, obserwują nieznane wcześniej zjawiska.

programme.title: La dea fortuna
Sekret bogini fortuny
La dea fortuna
programme.desc:
La dea fortuna: Directed by Ferzan Ozpetek. With Stefano Accorsi, Jasmine Trinca, Edoardo Leo, Serra Yilmaz. When Annamaria, a longtime friend of Alessandro and Arturo, asks the couple to take care of her children, the relationship between the two men reaches a point of no return." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10256570/","name":"La dea fortuna","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWQ0OTlmYjctNDc1NC00NDc1LWFiM2EtZWUzZTE3MTUwNTNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzIzNDU1NTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Annamaria, a longtime friend of Alessandro and Arturo, asks the couple to take care of her children, the relationship between the two men reaches a point of no return.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10256570/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"yusufpiskin"},"dateCreated":"2021-08-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pure Beauty","reviewBody":"It is a Ferzan Özpetek film with the beauty we are used to, but it still has features that distinguish it from his films. For example, Ferzan used child actors for the first time, which has a great impact on the texture of the film, both young actors.

It is a pity that it was not screened in many countries of the world, including Turkey. The blu-ray copy that came out in Europe is beautifully crafted.

The movie reminded me that I miss Ferzan the most. It's been 4 years since I've seen him. Maybe one day I'll get a Blu-Ray copy of this movie signed as well.

While even Blockbuster films were heavily affected by the covid-19 process, such naive films unfortunately boiled away.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1832,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-12-19","keywords":"friend,gay,gay couple,marital crisis,infidelity","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4219846425","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI4N2NjNzMtM2QzOC00ZDM5LTk0OTgtM2U5NDJjNDgyZDRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzI4N2NjNzMtM2QzOC00ZDM5LTk0OTgtM2U5NDJjNDgyZDRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0009629/","name":"Stefano Accorsi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0872910/","name":"Jasmine Trinca"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0502412/","name":"Edoardo Leo"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654858/","name":"Ferzan Ozpetek"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021904/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0278508/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654858/","name":"Ferzan Ozpetek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710011/","name":"Silvia Ranfagni"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0739744/","name":"Gianni Romoli"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

It is a pity that it was not screened in many countries of the world, including Turkey. The blu-ray copy that came out in Europe is beautifully crafted.

Lincoln
Lincoln
programme.desc: Lincoln: Directed by Steven Spielberg. With Daniel Day-Lewis, Sally Field, David Strathairn, Joseph Gordon-Levitt. As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0443272/","name":"Lincoln","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNzczMDUyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM2ODEzOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0443272/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2012-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Daniel Day Lewis Factor","reviewBody":"I remember fondly, Henry Fonda and Raymond Massey as Lincolns in "Young Mr.Lincoln" and "Abe Lincoln in Illinois" They gave remarkable performances. But, here and now in this extraordinary Steven Spielberg/Tony Kushner version, the illusion is complete. I was watching the president and not for a moment thought of the actor. That in itself is close to unique. I left the theater with the feeling I've just had an out of body experience. Everything around the central performance - and I call it a performance because I don't know what else to call it - falls into place in a miraculous way. The photography, the production design, the wardrobe made it possible to actually smell the period. Congratulations and thank you.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":252568,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2013-02-20","keywords":"based on real person,1860s,american civil war,politics,cultural conflict","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Winner: Best Actor","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi759866393","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MzYzOTY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDE5OTA3OA@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc2MzYzOTY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDE5OTA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield and as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000358/","name":"Daniel Day-Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000398/","name":"Sally Field"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000657/","name":"David Strathairn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000229/","name":"Steven Spielberg"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0336601/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1065785/","name":"Tony Kushner"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0329447/","name":"Doris Kearns Goodwin"}],"duration":"PT2H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Catcher Was a Spy
Projekt Larson
The Catcher Was a Spy
programme.desc: The Catcher Was a Spy: Directed by Ben Lewin. With Paul Rudd, Pierfrancesco Favino, Tom Wilkinson, Connie Nielsen. Former Major League Baseball player Moe Berg goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4602066/","name":"The Catcher Was a Spy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODhlNDc0ZTQtN2FiOS00OGRiLWE2YmYtZmI2ZmU1NzM5MmJlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODY3Nzc0OTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Former Major League Baseball player Moe Berg goes undercover in World War II Europe for the Office of Strategic Services.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4602066/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jakob13"},"dateCreated":"2018-07-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"The spy who never came in from the cold","reviewBody":"Ben Lewin has brought Nicholas Dawidoff 1994 biography about the mysterious Moe Berg. And Moe Berg remained a mystery until he died. Here's food for thought: when you think of Jews in baseball Moe Berg's name doesn't easily come to mind. Hank Grrenberg, yes. Sandy Kofax, for sure. Not Moe Berg who played for the Boston Red Sox during the 20s and the 30s. 'The Catcher was a Spy' is a conventional film with a fascinating 'hero': a polyglot, a polymath, born of Eastern Europeans Jews who settled in Harlem. And yet, Berg, played by a charming Paul Rudd who like his character celebrates tight lip secrecy. It is to Rudd's credit to have learned smatterings of six or seven languages to give body to his character who know many, many more. Berg graduated summa laude from Princeton when few Jews could attend. A lawyer from Columbia law who passed the bar before he finished his degree. Yet baseball was his life as was spying. The script writers give short shift to the spy Berg when he went to Japan with an all-star team that included Babe Ruth. We get the idea Berg dresses up as a Japanese in full kimono, armed with a camera films from the roof of a hospital Tokyo Harbor which had a dual use as a military facility. It would have taken too much to explain the prewar politics and the role of Japan invading Manchuria, testing America's and European empires' turf in Asia. So, although Berg was acting on behalf of a rudimentary US spy agency, Lewin's script white washes it as an act of a patriot. There is a 'love' story, but beneath the surface the film there is a flaw, a 'moral flaw' for the time. Was Berg queer? Probably. A scene of a night visit to the waterfront frequented by men, and non reputable bars frequented soley by men. Now to the film: Wild Bill Donovan, founder of the OSS, predecessor to the CIA, recruits Berg after Pearl Harbor. Donovan asks him if he's queer. And without a beat, Rudd replies, 'I know how to keep secrets'; to which Donovan replies, I don't care wo a man f--ks, I'm only interested if he's wants us to win the war'. Berg's assignment is to kill Werner Heisenberg, father of the German nuclear bomb. And here the film takes wings...and a high moment of the 'Catcher was a Spy' is when Rudd and Strong play mental chess, to fathom have the Germans the bomb. And here we see Berg has a dialectical frame of mind, he's willing to spare Heisenberg for an answer that Germany's nuclear project is not very advanced. (Heisenberg is the object of an award winning play "Copenhagen' that infers Heisenberg purposefully delayed Hitler's plans for a nuclear weapon.) The camera turns all over the place Japan, Italy, New York and Switzerland. Long shots, close shots, it runs the full alphabet of film making. Rudd speaks his languages fairly well with a good accent, but slips briefly when it comes to French. There is nothing dramatically wrong, but the film never plumbs the secretive Moe Berg. At the end we are told Berg never married and spent time in libraries. And yet he never left the CIAin mind and spirit and died the loner he was.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8951,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2018-06-22","keywords":"espionage,spy,baseball,baseball player,boston red sox","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2587998233","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5N2JmYmMtNzQzNy00N2E5LWJhZjktMDQ5YmFmYjI4ZDE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjI5N2JmYmMtNzQzNy00N2E5LWJhZjktMDQ5YmFmYjI4ZDE4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Catcher Was a Spy tells the true story of Morris "Moe" Berg (Paul Rudd), the Major League Baseball player, Ivy League graduate, attorney and top-secret spy who helped the U.S. defeat Nazi Germany in the race to build the atomic bomb."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0748620/","name":"Paul Rudd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0269419/","name":"Pierfrancesco Favino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0929489/","name":"Tom Wilkinson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506802/","name":"Ben Lewin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037203/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092860/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0240363/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734441/","name":"Robert Rodat"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7260546/","name":"Nicholas Dawidoff"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Songbird
Songbird. Rozdzieleni
Songbird
programme.desc: Songbird: Directed by Adam Mason. With K.J. Apa, Sofia Carson, Craig Robinson, Bradley Whitford. In 2024 a pandemic ravages the world and its cities. Centering on a handful of people as they navigate the obstacles currently hindering society: disease, martial law, quarantine, and vigilantes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt12592252/","name":"Songbird","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDA1MTYxNjctYjQyOS00OTQ2LWFkNGMtMmZkNDg0ZDNjNDYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjY1MTg4Mzc@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 2024 a pandemic ravages the world and its cities. Centering on a handful of people as they navigate the obstacles currently hindering society: disease, martial law, quarantine, and vigilantes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt12592252/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fortunefox"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining!","reviewBody":"Ok so it's not Oscar material but that being said it was really good! It was thrilling and it kept my attention. In this age of Covid this movie is a must see. I'm glad I didn't listen to the reviews. I also liked the love story plot...and the character relationships that show how the virus can either bring people together or tear them apart. It can bring out the best in some people or the worst.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":8479,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-12-11","keywords":"older man younger woman kiss,older man younger woman affair,2020s,pandemic,quarantine","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1508884761","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM1OGE5NjMtZTgxMy00OGRiLTk1OWQtMWJmMjQ5NjgxZWFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM1OGE5NjMtZTgxMy00OGRiLTk1OWQtMWJmMjQ5NjgxZWFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXNuZXNodQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four years into quarantine the virus has changed and so have we... \n \nThe COVID-23 virus has mutated and the world is in its fourth year of lockdown. programme.title: Jestem REN
Jestem REN
programme.desc: Jestem REN: Directed by Patricia Ryczko. With Marta Król, Marcin Sztabinski, Marieta Zukowska, Janusz Chabior. We meet a mother quietly obsessing over the sudden change in her family's life. Gradually we learn she is an android, and has suffered a glitch. The company puts her into therapy in order to assess the damage. She comes to see that her android self is her own fantasy. She begins to cooperate with the therapy, realizing she will be able to return to her family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt11067160/","name":"Jestem REN","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTFiNDYxZDQtYzZjOC00NmU5LTllYjEtZjc4MWFhZGRhZTllXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzUwOTc4NjY@._V1_.jpg","description":"We meet a mother quietly obsessing over the sudden change in her family's life. Gradually we learn she is an android, and has suffered a glitch. The company puts her into therapy in order to assess the damage. She comes to see that h","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt11067160/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"fxflinn"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thought provoking parable of mental illness","reviewBody":"Caught this at the Boston Science Fiction Film Festival in Feb 2020. It's a tidy, well made film that draws you into a family battling the mental illness of the mother, who believes she is a sentient android who has malfunctioned. But maybe she is a human who has constructed an elaborate backstory to hide from the pain of being a person who cannot love and who cannot stop beating her on-the-cusp of manhood son. The material clues suggest we are in our time, not some future echoing the television series "Humans," but we are looking at the world through the eyes of the narrator, the mother, and she sees clues about her android origin everywhere. By the time the movie reaches its conclusion, you've been drawn into the madness, the uncertainty of what is human, what is programming, and profound discomfort for the mom and her interior life. The dedication at the end of the film makes it clear the filmmaker wanted to share his experience with his mother and her struggle. He succeeded. The intimate cinematography is a case study in how closeups and lighting can draw an audience into the interior life of the characters. The actors all do a fine job, particularly Marta Krol in the role of the mother and Marieta Zukowska as her peer, counterpart, alter ego or therapist -- when you are in psychosis, those around you play many roles.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":73,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"genre":["Drama","Sci-Fi","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2020-03-27","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2067989/","name":"Marta Król"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2029225/","name":"Marcin Sztabinski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2346424/","name":"Marieta Zukowska"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2253296/","name":"Patricia Ryczko"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0734708/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0767135/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0778711/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2253296/","name":"Patricia Ryczko"}],"duration":"PT1H15M"}</script><metacontent="

As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0443272/","name":"Lincoln","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQzNzczMDUyNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjM2ODEzOA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the American Civil War continues to rage, America's president struggles with continuing carnage on the battlefield as he fights with many inside his own cabinet on the decision to emancipate the slaves.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0443272/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"littlemartinarocena"},"dateCreated":"2012-11-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Daniel Day Lewis Factor","reviewBody":"I remember fondly, Henry Fonda and Raymond Massey as Lincolns in "Young Mr.Lincoln" and "Abe Lincoln in Illinois" They gave remarkable performances. But, here and now in this extraordinary Steven Spielberg/Tony Kushner version, the illusion is complete. I was watching the president and not for a moment thought of the actor. That in itself is close to unique. I left the theater with the feeling I've just had an out of body experience. Everything around the central performance - and I call it a performance because I don't know what else to call it - falls into place in a miraculous way. The photography, the production design, the wardrobe made it possible to actually smell the period. programme.title: Hollywood Buzz
programme.desc: W programie nowości kinowe, relacje z planów zdjęciowych oraz ciekawostki związanych z gwiazdami srebrnego ekranu. O pracy nad najnowszymi hollywoodzkimi produkcjami opowiadają ich twórcy - znani reżyserzy i aktorzy. Autorzy magazynu przedstawiają również zwiastuny filmów wchodzących na ekrany kin.

programme.title: MTV Unplugged. Krzysztof Zalewski
programme.desc: Niepoprawna marzycielka Léa pisze książkę, która robi furorę. Sukces odmienia jej życie. Kobieta staje się sławna, obraca w towarzystwie artystów i zaczyna świetnie zarabiać. Bliscy, którzy wcześniej pobłażliwie traktowali jej aspiracje, teraz muszą zmierzyć się z nową sytuacją. Trudno im pogodzić się z tym faktem.

programme.title: Fantastic Four
Fantastyczna Czwórka
Fantastic Four
programme.desc:
Fantastic Four: Directed by Josh Trank, Stephen E. Rivkin. With Miles Teller, Michael B. Jordan, Kate Mara, Jamie Bell. Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned enemy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1502712/","name":"Fantastic Four","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk0OTMyMDA0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzY5NTkzNTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. The four must learn to harness their new abilities and work together to save Earth from a former friend turned en","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1502712/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"minimeyn"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Had potential, but a total dud","reviewBody":"This movie had potential to be bigger than the rather 'bleak' 2005 version. I wasn't overly impressed with the younger cast but thought maybe they would take a different aspect on the film. I was also keen on how Dr. Doom would be portrayed and how he would influence the film as a villain. 

I couldn't be more wrong. 

-There was limited character back-story on the Fan 4 -There was no middle just a five minute climax at the end that was hardly gripping -The cringe-worthy quotes towards the end of the film were just punishing to watch -Dr. Doom looks like a Droid and goes completely insane over a minor issue and the movie doesn't quite explain why -Dr. Doom is also meant to be one of the most O.P characters in the comics but yet he seems to drop down to the levels of the Fan 4 in the final battle which previously you saw him destroy anything in his path previously. -Whats the go with Tim Nelson being in this movie seriously can they stop regurgitating actors from previously failed ' marvel ' movies and maybe have a fresh start for some characters, especially for someone with a mediocre role as he had -Not really a huge issue but very disappointingly no after credits scenes which are signature to marvel based moves ( even though it is owned by FOX ) 

The only reason I have given it a 3 is the visual effects, only for one character though. The Thing looked insane compared to the 2005 version, only problem was due to the short length of the movie he got limited time and whipped out some really punishing quotes towards the end of the movie. Also I did like Franklin Storm in this film, he was a breathe of fresh air...but again wasn't perfected pulling out some pretty cheesy lines.

So overall it was a total dud, no background characterisation on the characters, if there was it was limited and to go along with the short running time, it was hard to watch. Dialogue was just really, really average and I spent a lot of time watching the movie with my hands on my head in agony.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":158939,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2015-08-05","keywords":"troubled production,marvel comics,fantastic four,invisibility,superhero team","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3166483225","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczNDc3OTkxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTY5ODUyNjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTczNDc3OTkxMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTY5ODUyNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Four young outsiders teleport to an alternate and dangerous universe which alters their physical form in shocking ways. programme.title: Oleg
Oleg
programme.desc:
Oleg: Directed by Juris Kursietis. With Valentin Novopolskij, Dawid Ogrodnik, Anna Próchniak, Guna Zarina. A young Latvian butcher travels to Brussels in search of better wage but a series of misfortunes lead him to fall under the sway of a Polish criminal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7714770/","name":"Oleg","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTRmNzQ1YmItZjdiMC00ODZhLTk5ZTAtNjI1NTAwZGE1OTI0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDE1MTYxNjk@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Latvian butcher travels to Brussels in search of better wage but a series of misfortunes lead him to fall under the sway of a Polish criminal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7714770/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MarcoParzivalRocha"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"The life of many migrants","reviewBody":"Oleg, a young man from Latvia, travels to Brussels in search of a better life, however, a series of misfortunes causes him to fall into the hands of an unscrupulous criminal.

Although the pertinent and very current message, Oleg fails in some certain points, and because of that, the film can't reach the high level, so to speak, lacking the reflective and emotional tone, but still, the film leaves interesting notes along the way.

The narrative focus on a story that is not new, of someone looking for something more in life, especially at the financial level, subjecting himself to exploitation and abuse.

It's the point of view from the citizens of the East Europe, and how the most advanced European countries treat "outsiders", and how acceptance and integration are mere illusions for them.

The cinematography adopts a style similar to a documentary, with very closed shots, giving a feeling of claustrophobia and constant pursuit, which works well.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":838,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2019-10-04","keywords":"immigrant,butcher,mob,brussels belgium","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3239511/","name":"Valentin Novopolskij"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4221607/","name":"Dawid Ogrodnik"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4452669/","name":"Anna Próchniak"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3302367/","name":"Juris Kursietis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0477054/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0213940/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0403374/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm9550101/","name":"Liga Celma-Kursiete"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3302367/","name":"Juris Kursietis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1213663/","name":"Kaspars Odins"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="
